Name: Reverie
About the game: *DISCLAIMER: Discard your expectations. It's barely a game. It's more like an interactive wallpaper, really. XD An ambient, very simple game* with pseudo-puzzle elements, something you can leave open on a second monitor while you work. Experience this peaceful world through the eyes of a sentient pillowcase. Navigate dreamscapes and curious events best experienced, but not dwelt upon too much. After all, a dream is just a dream, right? Click on objects to interact with them, press Z to zoom in/out Alter the dreamscape through interaction chains Unlock more dreamscapes by opening portals But most of all, just enjoy. Even if it makes very little sense. ^_^
